author: kou
msg: Clean up Ruby part configuration script.
- Use changequote() to use "[]" in Ruby script.
- Store configurations of ruby to rbconfig_XXX and use them to clean up.

author: kou
msg: Use empty object-like macro for empty argument in function-like macro

author: kou
msg: Use SIZEOF_LONG_LONG instead of sizeof(long long) and define codes
using sizeof(long long) as convenience macros, AOFF2NUM and AI642NUM.
